title: Check a Story for Plagiarism
description: Before publication, an editor must check a freelance submission to ensure it is original work and does not contain plagiarism.

tasks.description: Copy the text of the submitted article.
tasks.expected_outcome: The text is ready to be checked.

tasks.description: Run the text through a plagiarism detection tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool scans the web and internal archives for matching text.

tasks.description: Review the plagiarism report and investigate any flagged passages to determine if they are properly attributed or constitute plagiarism.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a final determination on the originality of the work.
